channel.title: [Added] Two proposed additions to Organisation Registration Agency Codelist
channel.description:
The following two additions to the Organisation Registration Agency codelist have been proposed. Following successful approval from the IATI technical team they will be added to the codelist within a week.
Code: HK-CR Name: Hong Kong Companies Registry Description: Hong Kong Companies Registry registers local and non-Hong Kong companies and statutory returns, de-registers defunct solvent companies and provides the public with services and facilities for inspecting and obtaining company information kept by the Registry. URL: http://www.cr.gov.hk/en/home/ Public database: True
Code: IN-MHA Name: Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India Description: Government of India Ministry of Home Affairs Foreigners Division provides registration under the Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act (FCRA). URL: https://fcraonline.nic.in/home/index.aspx Public database: True

item.title: [Added] Two proposed additions to Organisation Registration Agency Codelist
item.dc:creator: Wendy
item.source: [Added] Two proposed additions to Organisation Registration Agency Codelist

item.title: [Added] Two proposed additions to Organisation Registration Agency Codelist
item.dc:creator: petyakangalova
item.description:
The following two additions to the Organisation Registration Agency codelist have been proposed. Following successful approval from the IATI technical team they will be added to the codelist within a week.

Code: HK-CR
Name: Hong Kong Companies Registry
Description: Hong Kong Companies Registry registers local and non-Hong Kong companies and statutory returns, de-registers defunct solvent companies and provides the public with services and facilities for inspecting and obtaining company information kept by the Registry.
URL: http://www.cr.gov.hk/en/home/
Public database: True

Code: IN-MHA
Name: Ministry of Home Affairs, Government of India
Description: Government of India Ministry of Home Affairs Foreigners Division provides registration under the Foreign Contribution (Regulation) Act (FCRA).
URL: https://fcraonline.nic.in/home/index.aspx
Public database: True
